QuestInfo.briefDiz: Korosseo no kyoodoo shoyuu-sha ni naru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Watashi wa koroshiamu no kyoodoo oonaa ni naru kikai ga arimashita. Watashi no kooken ni taishite, watashi wa kabushiki no ichibu to antei shita rieki o uketorimasu.
Nimotsu o Yujinii ni motte iku hitsuyoo ga arimasu. Shoonin no Serugo wa watashi no chichi to yooji ga arimasu.
Kankyaku o atsumeru tame ni korosseo de ekishibishonbatoru o kaisai shinakereba narimasen.
Kookogaku-sha ga kyoomibukai mono o hakkutsu shita to iwa rete imasu. Sekyuriti o kechi tte irunode, kanari no okane o kasegu koto ga dekimasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Obujekuto %2n made yusoo o goei shimasu
QuestInfo.fullDiz: %1n no mura kara, kichoona kamotsu o tsunda yusoo-sen o %3d de obujekuto %2n made goei shite hoshii to tanoma remashita.
%1n shi no kyojuu-sha ga, %2n mura made no dooro no kootsuu shudan o hogo suru yoo watashi ni irai shi, %3d o shiharau to yakusoku shimashita.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Yusoo no anzen-sei o kakuho suru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: %1n ichi wa, kichoona kamotsu o shisetsu %2n made hakobu yusoo-sen no goei o irai shite imasu. Subete ga junchoo ni ikeba, %3d ga e raremasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Obujekuto %2n made yusoo o goei shimasu
QuestInfo.fullDiz: %1n no toshi kara no yusoo wa kooeki-ji ni sotte %2n no mura made susumimasu. Saikin, tandoku torakku e no shuugeki ga hinpan ni natte irunode, %3d to iu sasayakana hooshuu de kare o mamoru koto ni dooi shita.
%1n no toshi wa, %3d no hooshuu de teki o senmetsu suru yoo motomete imasu.
Oyaji %1n no juumin wa, kookatsuna sanzoku ni yoru hinpan'na koogeki ni sarasa rete imasu. %3d no kyooi o torinozoku no o tetsudaimasu.
%1n no toshi no shuui kara 1-ri no akutoo o haijo suru to, %3d o uketorimasu.
%1n no toshi wa, watashi ga sooguu shita subete no sanzoku no hakai no hiyoo o shiharaimasu %3d.
Sanzoku-tachi wa haji o sukkari ushinatta nodesu! Watashitachi wa karera ni yoi kyookun o oshieru hitsuyoo ga arimasu. Sarani, %1n no ichi wa, kaku %3d toozoku no hakai no hiyoo o shiharaimasu.
%1n no ichi tookyoku wa kootsuu anzen no tame ni tatakai o kaishi shimashita. Mein ibento wa kuriin'appu sakusendesu. Subete no teki sharyoo o hakai suruto %3d o kakutoku dekimasu.
Watashi no okane no sokosoko no wariai de, %2b guruupu wa watashi to wakai suru yooi ga arimasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Sanpuru o %2n no mura ni motteikimasu
QuestInfo.fullDiz: %1n no machi wa, kenkyuu sanpuru o %2n no machi ni motte iku koto o nozonde imasu. Toochaku shidai, %3d o uketorimasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: %2n no mura ni nimotsu o todokete kudasai
QuestInfo.fullDiz: %2n no mura ni nimotsu o haitatsu suru to, %3d o uketorimasu. Karera wa sokode kanojo o matteimasu ga, sono yoo na bakageta okane no tame, watashi wa sorehodo isogu tsumori wa arimasen.
%1n shi shusshin no henjin wa, %2n no shuuraku ni sunde iru yuujin ni aisatsu shitara %3d harau tsumoridesu.
Bosutoochinui no juumin ni korosseo no kaikan ni tsuite tsutaemasu.
Kooun'na koto ni, Ben Dorosseru ga chikaku ni sunde imasu. Kare ni atte, kare ga watashi ya saikin no dekigoto todo no yoona kankei ga aru no ka o shirabenakereba narimasen.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ben Dorosseru ga daredearu ka o shiraberu
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Watashinojinsei wa subete hikkurikaerimashita. Jibun o mitsukeru tame ni wa, nani to shite demo hontoo no chichioya o mitsukenakereba narimasen! Yuiitsu no tegakari wa Ben Dorosseru to iu namaeda.
Hoomaa wa osoraku gyoson no hitotsu no baa ni komotte irudarou. Kare o mitsukeru no wa muzukashikunaideshou.
Hoomaa wa osoraku gyoson no hitotsu no baa ni komotte irudarou. Kare o mitsukeru no wa muzukashikunaideshou.
Sooko wa kageki-ha ni yotte senkyo sa reta. Watashi ga karera no shidoo-sha o toraware no mi kara kaihoo sureba, karera wa tachisari, shoonin-tachi ga heiwa ni hatarakeru yoo ni shite kurerudarou.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Oruma de riidaa ga koosoku sa rete iru basho o shiraberu
Riidaa to tomoni yusoo o boogai suru
Sentoo sharyoo no busoo o kaijo suru
Riidaa o sentoo-in no tokoro e tsureteiku

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Toozoku ga chikaku de hakkutsu sagyoo o shite ita kookogaku-sha-tachi ni iyagarase o shite iru. Watashi wa, hakkutsu sa reta takaramono o shingai suru sanzoku no koogeki kara karera o mamoru koto ni dooi shimashita.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Sooko o senkyo shita sanzoku o taosu
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Sooko o kuria suru ni wa nitsu no hoohoo ga ari, sonoochi no 1-tsu wa subete no kageki-ha o korosu kotodesu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Korosseo no katsudoo o soshiki suru no o tetsudattekudasai
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Kigyooka-tachi wa korosseo no saikai o nozonde iru. Zan'nen'nakotoni, karera no kookoku yosan wa mattaku hoogai ni sukunaidesu. Soshite neko wa juubun'na keiken o tsunde imasu. Shikashi, watashi wa sore demo kono kon'nan'na mondai ni kanshite karera o tasukeru koto ni dooi shimashita.
Middogarudo no korosseo ni tsuite oshietekudasai. Karera wa osoraku, atarashii entaateimentosentaa no shutsugen ni tsuite shiri, yorokonde irudeshou.
Poruto no korosseo ni tsuite oshietekudasai. Sugu ni, subete no shuyoo toshi kara hitobito ga entaateimento o motomete soko ni atsumarudeshou.
Watashi wa keiyaku shuuryoo o mamorimashita. Ima, anata wa toozen no hooshuu o uketoru hitsuyoo ga arimasu.
Watashi wa keiyaku shuuryoo o mamorimashita. Ima, anata wa toozen no hooshuu o uketoru hitsuyoo ga arimasu.
Hitobito wa hata ni arawareru fushigina chookoo ni tsuite kujoo o iimasu. Sore o rikai suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu.
Hitobito wa hata ni arawareru fushigina chookoo ni tsuite kujoo o iimasu. Osoraku karera no gaiken ni wa nanrakano ronri ga aru nodeshou.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Kagaku-sha ni chookoo ni tsuite tsutaeru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Nani ga kono kimyoona genshoo o hikiokoshita no ka soozoo dekimasen. Middogarudo no kagaku-sha wa, koko de jissai ni nani ga okotte iru no ka o kaimei dekirudeshou.
Torihiki ga seikoo shitara, ienikaeru jikandesu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Sooko o toozoku kara kaihoo suru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Toreedaa no sooko ga kageki-ha ni senkyo sa reta. Karera o soko kara oidasu nanrakano hoohoo ga aru hazudesu.
Yaaru no murabito-tachi wa obiete imasu. Nani ka shinkokuna koto ga okotte iru kanoosei ga arimasu.
Nooka o gasorinsutando ni tsureteiku to, yoku okane o haratte kuremasu. Juuyoona koto wa, jinsoku ni sagyoo o okonai, seikaku ni mokutekichi ni todokeru kotodesu.
Dooyara, kono machi no juumin wa nishi no yama o kuruma de toorinukeru hoohoo o shitte iru yoodesu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Baa ni toochaku shi, pasuwaado o tsutaeru
Koozan-mura de bakuhatsu-mono o koonyuu suru
Sanzoku no koogeki o gekitai suru

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Watashi no ninmu wa yusoo no anzen o kakuho suru kotodesu. Kamotsu wa ikanaru hiyoo o haratte demo haitatsu shinakereba narimasen.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Middogarudo e no yusoo de modoru

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Bakuhatsu-mono o motte imasu. Nokotte iru no wa hashi o saikutsu suru koto dakedesu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Toozoku kara ido o kaihoo suru
Chichioya no ie o soosaku suru

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Akuseru wa aruzan de akuyaku shuudan o keiei shite iru. Soko ni iku ni wa yamawokoeru hoohoo o mitsukenakereba narimasen.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Toozoku kyanpu o mitsukete hakai suru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Saigo no teki wa nigedasu. Watashi wa kare o otte toozoku no kichi made iki, kono kumo no su o hakai suru koto ga dekimasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ben ga saigo ni mokugeki sa reta no wa Middogarudodatta
Yuujinii no baa de kare no koto o tazunete kudasai

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Kore de ton'neru no basho ga wakarimashita. Kon'nan ga okoranai koto o negatte imasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Yuujinii no baa de Ferikkusu o mitsukeru
Koya ni iru Ben to hanasu
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Moosugu Ben Dorosseru ni ai, jibun no shutsuji ni tsuite no shinjitsu o shiru koto ni naru.
Osoraku, baatendaa wa ton'neru no kagi o motte ori, watashi ga ichiba no hoosoku o tadashiku rikai shite ireba, sore o kau koto ga dekirudeshou.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Machibuse no kanoosei ga aru basho o kakunin suru
Risa on Base 51 ni tsuite shitsumon suru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Risa wa omotte iru hodo tanjunde wa nai yoodesu. Kanojo wa akiraka ni sanzoku to kankei ga aru. Amari odoroita to iu wakede wa nai nodesuga�
Moosugu, Risa wa jibun ga shite kita koto subete no daishoo o harau koto ni narudeshou! Ima, watashi wa kanojo ga doko ni iru no ka seikaku ni shitte imasu!

Kekkyokunotokoro, chichi no shi wa Ferikkusu no seide wa nai yoodesu. Risa wa yuiitsu no mokugeki-sha to shite nokorimasu. Kanojo wa kita e ikimashita. Watashi ni totte wa, kanojo ni shitagatte kudasai.
Tooku hanareta kita no shima ni, Orakuru ga sunde iru to uwasa sa rete imasu. Iwan Guo ga nokoshita michi ga soko ni tsudzuite imasu.
Watashi no chichi wa mada ikite iru kamo shiremasen! Watashi wa shoogai o kakete kare no soosaku ni torikumimasu.|Miinin no kare no ie ni wa ikutsu ka no tegakari ga nokotte iru kamo shiremasen.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: HY no Marettsuia de saiyoo tantoosha o sagasu
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Hiiro no Yoake wa aratana faitaa o boshuu shite orimasu. Sono ichiin ni nareba Akuseru ni chikadzuku chansuda.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: DTR no Ace rikuruutaa de kensaku
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Dokuritsu toshi wa akuseru to notatakai de tasuke o hitsuyoo to shite imasu. Chikara o awasereba bookun o uchiyaburu koto ga dekiru.
Haruka kita no doko ka ni umi no mon ga arimasu. Miinin kara no kyaraban ga tadashii michi o oshiete kurerudeshou.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Miinin no juugyooin to kooshoo suru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Ido no roodoo-sha ga Miinin no baa ni suwatte imasu. Karera ga shigoto ni modoru yoo ni kooshoo suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu.
Kitto osokare hayakare darekaga ton'neru kara detekurudeshou. Watashi ga kagi o toriageru no wa kare karadesu. Omona koto wa matsu kotodesu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Gendenburukusuku mura e no kootsuu shudan ni shitagatte kudasai.

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Kore made, HY wa ton'neru o tsuujite shigen to yoohei o uketorimashita. DTR wa kore o senryoo suru koto de, shinryaku-sha ni totte juuyoona doomyaku o shadan suru koto ni naru. Kore o okonau ni wa, subete no anchisukiru o korosu hitsuyoo ga arimasu.
Watashi no koodoo ga mitome rare, DTR saikoo shirei-bu ni hikidasa reru yoteidesu.
Shinjitsu no shunkan wa chikadzuite iru. Moosugu akuseru no me o mi rareru yoo ni narudarou.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Zaimka de kyooryokuna buki o mitsukeyou

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Pesuto no hitobito ni watashi o toosu tame ni wa, sanzoku no kyooi o haijo shinakereba narimasen. Kore o okonau mottomo kantan'na hoohoo wa, kichi ni tsuujiru hashi o bakuha suru kotodesu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Toozoku kara ido o kaihoo suru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Sarani kita e mukau ni wa, sekiyu seisan o kakuritsu suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu. Soo sureba, booeki kyaraban to issho ni kita ni iku koto ga dekimasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ookibona guruupu no shien o eru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Warui nyuusu. Risa wa chihoojichitai no gaarufurendodesu. Watashihitoride wa kare ni chikadzuku koto wa deki-soo ni arimasen. Doomei-sha o sagasanakereba narimasen.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ookibona guruupu no shien o eru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Dooyara hitoride wa akuseru made wa ikenai yooda. ookibona guruupu no shien o eru hitsuyoo ga arimasu.
Sanzoku-tachi wa, 10000 de watashi ni karera no tochi o tsuuka sa seru koto ni dooi shimashita.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Sanzoku-tachi ni dare ni te o dashita no ka o misetsukeru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Dooyara kono yaroo-tachi ga rikai dekiru yuiitsu no gengo wa juusei no yooda. Misete ageru yo!
Chiisana shuuraku wa tsuneni Hiiro no Yoake no bookan ni yoru shuugeki ni sarasa rete iru. Watashi wa koogeki o fusegu koto ga dekimasushi, soo shimasu.
Kitanai inboo no tame, kumiai-in-tachi wa sekiyu no saikutsu o kyohi shite iru. Osoraku shichoo no oshoku ni kansuru uwasa wa shinjitsu kara sorehodo tookunai no kamo shirenai.
Nazo no shoojo wa kanojo ni sono chiiki o an'nai suru to mooshidemashita. Kanojo wa mitsuyu-hin o yusoo shite iru no kamo shirenai.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Tosukaana no rejisutansu ni renraku suru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Akuseru ni chikadzuku chansudesu. Watashi wa Tosukaana no han seifu seiryoku to ai, karera ga hookoku dekiru to kangae rareru subete no koto o shirabenakereba narimasen.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Saisho no oirukyanisutaa o Miinin ni todokeru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Kono kyanisutaa wa, ido ga futatabi kadoo shite iru koto no tan'naru shoochoodesu. Watashitachi wa kanojo o machi ni tsurete ikanakereba narimasen.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Yatowa reta roodoo-sha o ido ni tsureteiku
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Sagyoo-in o ido ni tsuretekuru to, sugu ni sagyoo o hajimemasu. Kore wa, watashi no kita e no ryokoo ga mamonaku okonawa reru koto o imi shimasu.
Orakuru shima ni tsuujiru kaitei ton'neru no iriguchi o mitsukenakereba narimasen.
Okotta subete no ato, hanran-gun no shidoo-sha wa juuyoona joohoo o hookoku suru dake de sumimasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Pesuto de Miinin e no ikikata o shiraberu
Ippan HY o Herubetia ni todokeru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Soosa wa seijoo ni kanryoo shimashita. HY shoogun o hokaku suru koto ga dekimashita. Herubetia wa, kare wa jibun ga shitte iru subete o hanasu koto o kyoosei sa rerudeshou.
Ima, roodoo-sha-tachi wa jibun-tachi no unmei no shujindeari, futatabi ido de hataraku koto ni dooi shimashita.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Kagi o tsukatte ton'neru o akeru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Ton'neru no kagi o motte imasu. Ato wa akeru dakedesu.
Watashi no saisho no ninmu wa, kokkyoo de teki sharyoo o soosaku suru kotodesu.
Tashika ni tonari no murade wa roodoo-sha to kooshoo suru koto ga dekimasu. Shoogaku no hooshuu o shiharaeba, karera wa machigainaku koozan de hataraku koto ni dooi surudeshou.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Edo ga sanzoku ni taisho suru no o tetsudattekudasai
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Chiku no juumin wa toozoku-tachi ni kyookun o ataeru koto ni shimashita. Shuuto renshuu o suru zekkoo no chansudesu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Kootsuukikan de Touzu ni modori, hookoku suru

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Touzu ni modoru jikandesu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Toozoku kara ido o kaihoo shita koto o shichoo ni hookoku suru
Doko ka betsu no basho de kawa o watatte mite kudasai
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Kawa no mukoo-gawa ni ikanakereba narimasen. Kore wa pesuto matawa sanzoku no ryoodo de nomi jikkoo dekimasu...

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Rotorusuku mura e no kootsuukikan ni shitagatte kudasai.

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Ton'neru kara kuruma o oikakete, doraibaa ga oritara kii o uketorou to suru koto ga dekimasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Chichioya no shi ni fukushuu suru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Satsujin-sha ga doko ni kakurete ite mo, watashi wa kare o sagashidashi, sono tsumi o basshite yaru!
Suudai no DTR sharyoo to tomoni HY shoogun o hokaku shinakereba narimasen.
Osoraku Miinin no darekaga Kaimon ni tsuite shitte irudeshou.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Hanzai o shichoo ni tsuuhoo suru
Asugarudo ni ton'neru ni tsuite tazuneru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Soko ni iru darekaga, yamawokoeru hoohoo to basho o shitte iru hazudesu.
Tsuini sagi-shi Risa to seiseidoodoo to tatakaeru!
Aru josei kara, otto o ie ni tsuretekite hoshii to tanomareta. Kare wa chotto chooshi ga warukute, o sake o nomu no ga sukina ndesu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Middogarudo no kagaku-sha ni chookoo ni tsuite shiraseru

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Doruido soo wa, jibun no fiirudo ni kimyoona chookoo ga arawareta to iimashita. Kare ga nani o iitakatta no ka o miru kachi wa aru.
Kodokuna doruido soo wa osoraku hitobito o koishiku omotte irudeshou. Watashitachi wa kare ni furui yuujin kara no okurimono o watasanakereba narimasen.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Shokubutsu gakusha ni kusuri o motte iku
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Doko de kusuri o te ni ireru koto ga dekiru ka shiritaidesu ka? Iseki o nozoite mita hoo ga ii kamo shirenai�
Roohei wa yoku hanashita. Watashi no ikende wa, shokubutsu-gaku ni kansuru joohoo ga kare ga itta yuiitsu no kanren-sei no aru kotoda to omoimasu.
Chikaku ni hai byooin ga aru to kikimashita. Sokode nani ka omoshiroi mono ga mitsukaru to omoimasu.
Disuku o utta jinbutsu wa, Ben to no torihiki ga shippaishita-go, Middogarudo ni itta kanoosei ga arimasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ariina de ken tooshi o taosu
Middogarudo no masutaa ni sozai to 10 man watasu
Mezurashii sozai ni tsuite shitsumon suru
Pureeto ni tsuite Ben to hanasu
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Iwan Guo ga ryokoo-chuu ni gaikoku no sonzai ni sooguu shita ka doo ka o tashikani shiru hitsuyoo ga aru. Ko no koto o watashi ni kakujitsu ni oshiete kureru no wa Ben dakedesu.
Roojin wa, yasuragi o mitsukeru tame ni iseki ni tsureteitte hoshii to tanomimashita.
Mishiranu wakai kazoku o ie ni tsurete kaeranakereba narimasen. Karera wa tanjun'na shigoto ni taishite yoi hooshuu o yakusoku shimasu.
Pesuto no baa ni itako no shoonen no senden monku o shinjirunara, entaateimento sentaa wa masani arushuno rakuendesu.
Watashi no me wa aka remashita. Shintaku-sha wa okotte iru nodesu. Kare wa soosu toso no subete no himitsu o hakai shiyou to shite imasu. Demo kon'na koto wa yurusanai!
Seru-shi no hatsudenjo wa kanshoo-gen to natte imasu. Sukunakutomo suu-funkan wa kanojo o kizetsu sa seru hoohoo o mitsukenakereba narimasen.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Doroboo kara 2 maime no disuku o ubau
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Kono doroboo wa mada aite ga darena no ka wakatte imasen. Disuku wa don'na gisei o haratte mo watashi no mono ni narimasu. Kono mondai o kaiketsu dekiru no wa, watashitachi no dochira ka ga shinu koto dakedesu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Kita e no michi o shirabete kudasai
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Nazo no shoonin o ou no wa yosooijoo ni kon'nandatta. Ima, watashi wa miinin de kita e no michi o mitsukeru hitsuyoo ga arimasu.
Chichi no ie ni aru mono wa subete hikkurikaette shimaimashita. Osoraku hitobito no hitori ga koko de okotta koto o mokugeki shita nodeshou. Baa de kiite miruto ii yo.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Geeto ga doko ni aru ka shirabete kudasai

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Risa wa amyuretto to disuku o nusunda. Kanojo ga kanzen ni kieru mae ni oitsuku hitsuyoo ga arimasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Orakuru ni 2 maime no disuku o noohin
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Ryoohoo no disuku o teniiretanode, yooyaku chichi no unmei o shiru koto ga dekimasu. Nikki no naiyoo ga kare no ashiato o ou ichijo ni nareba saiwaidesu. Mochiron, kore ni wa Orakuru o miru tame ni Igunotto ni iku hitsuyoo ga arimasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Hooki sa reta toshi de tooboo-sha o tsukamaeru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Mura kara sorehodo tookunai hooki sa reta toshi ni, sanzoku ga kakurete imasu. Murabito-tachi wa kare o korosu no ni taikin o kurerudarou.

Orakuru wa, eirian no fune o hakai suru no ni juubun'na kyooryokuna buki ga doko ni aru ka o shitte iru hitsuyoo ga arimasu. Kono osoroshii basho wa, shuui 100 kiromeetoru ni watatte yaki tsukusa reru hitsuyoo ga arimasu.
Osoraku doroboo wa kichi 51 ni kakurete irudeshou. Kare wa toohin o booto ga atsumaru basho de urou to surudeshou.
Isoganakereba narimasen! Michi ga kuraku naru mae ni, Asugarudo de Risa ga doko e itta no ka o shirabenakereba narimasen.
Mon e no michi wa numachi de fusaga rete imasu. Mukoo-gawa ni iku tame no asase ka komichi o mitsukeru hitsuyoo ga arimasu.
Orakuru no setsumei ni itchi suru disuku o koonyuu suru yoo Ben ni susumeta otoko wa koko no doko ka ni sunde imasu. Kore ga masani watashi ga sagashite iru monodearu koto o negatte imasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ko bijutsu-hin no kantei-ka ni soodan shite miyou
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Darekaga esuteeto kara kodai geijutsu no ichireidearu kichoona kessaku o nusumimashita. Kono ito wa, aru kodai no aikoo-ka ni tsunagarimasu.
Kono chijoku no genkyoo wa, aru narazumonoda. Watashitachi wa kare ni oitsuki, kessaku o ubau hitsuyoo ga aru. Hitsuyoonioojite kyoosei-teki ni.
Hooshuu o uketoru ni wa, kessaku o bigaku-sha ni henkyaku suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu. To omowa reru kamo shirenaiga, soredemo rigai kankei-sha wa sonzai suru.
Nieri no soochi wa, soosu kara no chimei-tekina hooshasen o burokku suru koto ga dekirudeshou. Tadashi, tsuiraku shita fune no sugu chikaku ni setchi shita baai ni kagirimasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Eirian no kichi o hakai suru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Doko karatomo naku isei gunkan ga arawareta. Orakuru no shingoo o burokku suru hadoo o hassuru no wa karedesu. Jinrui o sukuu tame ni wa teki o horobosanakereba narimasen.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Mafia no bosu o haijo suru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Mafia no bosu ga watashi ga kare no shoohin o nusunda koto o shittara, watashi ni ooku no mondai o hikiokosu kanoosei ga arimasu. Koo naru mae ni kare o korosanakereba narimasen.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Yusoo kikan o hakai shite kamotsu o ubau
Shoohin o motte roogu ni modoru

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Nanto iu kooundeshou! Suteeshon no mondai ni yori, eirian wa kichi no basho o morashite shimatta. Ima dewa karera to hanasu koto ga dekimasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Seru no machi no juunin ni hanashikakeru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Kono hatsudenjo toshi no chikaku no doko ka de, Iwan Guo wa katsute eirian no katsudoo ni kidzukimashita.
Sugu ni yusoo-sen ga, ureru kamotsu o tsunde koko no minami kara shuppatsu shimasu. Kare wa kidzuka rezu ni toorisugiyou to surudeshouga, watashiniha-soode wa arimasen.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Rejisutansu senshi no furi o suru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Watashi no ninmu wa, shisu eejento no furi o shite rejisutansu no tairetsu ni sen'nyuu suru kotodesu. Mitame mo pasuwaado mo shittemasu. Kore de juubundesu.
Hooshuu to atarashii ninmu o eru tame ni Marettsuia ni modoru toki ga kimashita.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Teki no heitan o konran sa seru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Watashi no ninmu wa yusoo kikan o hakai suru kotodesu. Watashi ga nusumeru mono wa subete watashi no monodesu.
Ferikkusu ga mata jama o shite kita. Kondo wa kare o yoosha shimasen!
Risa wa don'na shudan o tsukatte demo tomenakereba narimasen. Moo kanojo ni watashi ya hokanohito o damasa semasen!
Akuseru to toogi-ba de tatakatte, subete o katara sete yaru.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Seru no machi de Risa o sagasu
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Akuseru wa chichioya no shi ni jibun wa kan'yo shite inai to chikatta. Watashi wa korera no hitobito no naka ni sukoshi sunde itanode, ima dewa kare no koto o shinjiru keikoo ni arimasu. Dakara, Risa o mitsukete shinjitsu o katara seru hitsuyoo ga aru.
Shuudooin kara wain o hakobu to iu tanjun'na shigoto ni, doko ka ayashii kehai ga�

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Teki no tairetsu ni konran o hikiokosu
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Shinri-teki koogeki o kaishi suru toki ga kimashita. Mazuwa kita no patokaa o nandai ka hakai shinakereba narimasen.
Kono mura no juumin wa teki to kankei ga aru to mi rarete ita. Watashi wa kanojo o koogeki shite, DTR butai o omona koogeki hookoo kara hikihanashimasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: 2-Banme no disuku o Orakuru ni mochikonde kudasai
QuestInfo.fullDiz: 2-Mai-me no disuku o teniiretanode, yooyaku Iwan Guo no nikki o kaidoku dekiru yoo ni narimashita. Mochiron, kore ni wa Orakuru o miru tame ni Igunotto ni iku hitsuyoo ga arimasu.
Shuudooin no shuudooin-choo wa watashi o shuuha kari ni sasotte kuremashita. Naze damedesu ka.
Hanran-gun no shidoo-sha wa ikinokoranakereba naranai. Kare wa teki no keikaku ni kansuru juuyoona joohoo o teikyoo suru koto ga dekimasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Kooshoo-chuu ni DTR shidoo-sha o satsugai suru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Kono sensoo o yamereba, akuseru no te kara kanarazu mukuwa rerudarou.
Akuseru no te kara hooshuu o uketoru toki ga kita. Kore ga kare kara shageki kyori ni chikadzuku yuiitsu no chansuda.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Gomi o chikaku no mura ni motte iku
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Funjin no nai shigoto - aru basho kara betsu no basho e nimotsu o hakobu. Amari omoshiroi shigotode wa arimasenga, sorenari no okane o moratte imasu.
Furui enjin o yusoo suru hanashi ga omoshiroku narimasu. Mura de sore o kaesu mae ni, karera wa sore o Marettsuia ni kaesu yoo motomete watashi ni kaeshite kimashita.
Hooshuu to atarashii ninmu o eru tame ni Marettsuia ni modoru toki ga kimashita.
Hooshuu to atarashii ninmu o eru tame ni Marettsuia ni modoru toki ga kimashita.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Hanran-gun no kyanpu o hakai suru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Watashi wa muboobina hanran-gun o satsugai suru yoo meirei o ukemashita. Kore wa honmono no hanzainanode, ginen ni sainama rete imasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Shuudooin de Risa ni tsuite manabu
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Saishin no joohoo ni yoru to, Risa wa shuudooin ni kakurete iru soodesu. Sokode kanojo o oikoshite yaru!

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Middogarudo no kagaku-sha ni chookoo ni tsuite tsutaeru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Middogarudo no kagaku-sha wa sono yoona joohoo ni kyoomiwomotsudeshou. Kore de ikuraka okane o kasegu koto mo dekiru kamo shiremasen.
Hata no noomin ni totte nani ga sorehodo osoroshii no ka o mite miru kachi ga arimasu.
Doruido soo no shinrai o eru ni wa, karera no seiiki kara kootetsu no kaibutsu o issoo suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Monsutaa no kakurega kara no deguchi o fusaide kudasai

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Watashitachi ga deatta juumin wa hijoo ni fushinsetsuna hito-tachideshita. Motto ukeirete moraeru ta no mura o sagasu hitsuyoo ga aru.
Korera no tochi ni kuru no wa hajimetedesu. Jimoto no juumin o mitsukete, Orakuru o sagasu basho o oshietemorau hitsuyoo ga arimasu.
Korera no tochi ni kuru no wa hajimetedesu. Jimoto no juumin o mitsukete, orakuru o sagasu basho o oshietemorau hitsuyoo ga arimasu.
Tsuini Orakuru e no michi o mitsukeru koto ga dekimashita.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Uruku ni nani ga okotta no ka shirabete kudasai
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Uruku kara wa nagaiai otosata ga nakatta. Doruido soo wa watashi ni, sono juumin ni nani ga okotta no ka shirabete hoshii to tanonde kimashita.

Kikai suuhai-sha-tachi wa doruido soo o uchitaoshi, kenryoku o shooaku shitai to kangaete imasu. Dakarakoso karera wa aakudoruido o korosou to shite iru nodesu. Karera o sukereba, orakuru ni iku hoohoo ga wakarudeshou.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Doruido soo o machibuse basho ni tsureteiku

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Uruku no juumin zen'in ga kikai shuukyoo ni kuwawatta wakede wa arimasen. Doruido shinkoo ni chuujitsudeari tsudzuketa hitobito wa hakugai sa remasu. Karera o hoochi shite shina seru wake ni wa ikanai.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Mashin no koogeki o gekitai suru
Karera o Sesu no tokoro made goei suru

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Aachi doruido wa setto ni sunde imasu. Osoraku kare wa, orakuru o doko de sagaseba yoi no ka shitte irudeshou.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Orakuru no boogyo-sha o hakai suru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Nekkyoo-sha ga yoku rikai shite inai baai wa, karera no gengo de hanasu hitsuyoo ga arimasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Chichioya ni kansuru joohoo o shiraberu
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Sono nikki wa kare no chichioya no unmei o akiraka ni shimashita. Ima dewa shi no sabaku no mukoo-gawa de kare o sagasubekida to kakushin shimashita.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Kaibutsu no atama o motte kuru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Orakuru no yoogo-sha wa, monsutaa ga korosa rereba watashi o tsuuka sa semasu. Kare no kubi wa shooko to shite teishutsu sa renakereba narimasen.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Orakuru no memori o fukugen suru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Orakuru wa katsute hodo zenchide wa nai yoodesu. Kare no kioku o torimodosu ni wa, shuurikoo o shiji sa reta basho ni tsureteiku hitsuyoo ga arimasu.
Orakuru ni mukau tochuu ni wa anchisukiru ga imasu. Karera to kooshoo suru ka, oiharau hitsuyoo ga arimasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Sabaku e no ryokoo no junbi o suru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Sabaku o koe rareru yoo ni kuruma o appugureedo suruhitsuyoogaaru. Zumen ga aru node, sono shigoto o shite kureru shokunin o sagasu hitsuyoo ga arimasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Mura no hakai ni fukushuu suru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Tashika ni, Iwan Guo no nikki ni wa, shi no sabaku o oodan suru tame ni shiyoo dekiru soochi no keikaku ga fukuma rete imashita. Ima koso mura o horoboshita-sha-tachi o oitsumete korashimete yaru!
Osoraku 2-mai-me no disuku wa chichioya no ie ni arudeshou. Hajimete itta toki wa nanika o minogashite ita kamo shiremasen. Shikashi ima dewa, nani o sagaseba yoi no ka seikaku ni wakarimashita.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: 2-Mai-me no disuku ni tsuite Ben to hanasu
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Iwan Guo no yuujin de furui kenkyuushadearu Ben Dorosseru, 2-banme no enban no shozai ni tsuite nanika o shitte iru kamo shiremasen.
Orakuru wa, Risa wa jibun ga iu yori mo ooku no koto o shitte iru to shuchoo shite imasu. Izure ni shite mo, kanojo ni awanakereba narimasen.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Nitsu no aatifakuto o Orakuru ni mochikomu
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Orakuru wa, watashi ga hai koojoo kara nitsu no aatifakuto o motte kuru baai ni nomi, watashi o tasukeru koto ni dooi shimasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Kefu ni abura o kyookyuu suru

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Watashi wa kono kichi e no ooyoso no hookoo shika shirimasen. Demo, kono basho o kantan ni mitsukete, chichi o koroshita han'nin o baddekiru to kakushin shite imasu!
Shi no sabaku o koeru koto ga dekimashita! Kondo wa kooboo ga mitsukaruto yoidesu ne. Jimoto juumin zen'in ga koogeki-tekidenai koto o inoru bakaridesu.
Kono sabaku ni wa kimyoona hitobito ga sunde imasu. Karera kara wa nani mo eru koto ga dekimasen. Sukunakutomo watashi no shitsumon ni kotae rareru hito o mitsukeru hitsuyoo ga arimasu.
Iwan wa kono hookoo ni susumimashitaga, soreijoo wa nani mo shira rete imasen. Watashi wa kare o oikakete, kare ni nani ga okotta no ka o shirabemasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Sekiyu o Kefu ni motte iku
Abura o tori ni ido ni iku
Shippai o Kefu ni hookoku suru
Kefu ni wa abura ga hitsuyoodesu
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Sekiyu ga nakereba, Kefu no juumin wa te o ushinaimasu. Tankuroorii o tsukatte hakobikomu no o tetsudaimasu. Ensei-tai ga modotte kuru made machimasu.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Buhara no hitobito o minato ni hinan sa sete kudasai
Nanmin o noseta fune o anzen'na basho ni okuru koto ga dekiru minato o sagasu

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Moshi watashi ga korera no hitobito ga hakugai kara nogare rareru yoo ni tedasuke sureba, karera no kyooryoku o kitai suru koto ga dekimasu.
Pureeto wa watashitachi no sekai o hakai shita hooshasen no hassei-gendesu. Kanojo wa hakai sa renakereba narimasen!

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Kyoojin no eria o issoo suru
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Subete no konseki wa gunji kichi o shimeshite imasu. Kokora hen o yoku mite miru hitsuyoo ga aru. Demo, kono hito-tachi wa yuukoo-tekide wa nai to omoimasu. Tatoe sore ga machigatta michidatta to shite mo, sukunakutomo kono chiiki o kyoofu ni otoshiirete iru kyoojin-tachi o issoo shite yaru.
Kagaku-sha wa uchuusen ni tsuite nani ka iimashita. Kono soosu o kuwashiku shiraberu hitsuyoo ga arimasu.
Isei-sen wa watashitachi no sekai o hakai shita hooshasen-gendesu. Kanojo wa muryoku-ka sa reru hitsuyoo ga aru.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Kagaku-sha ni soosu ni tsuite hanasu
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Watashi wa kono osoroshii basho o mite, inochikaragara nigedashimashita. Osoroshii chikara ga watashi o hooshasen no chuushin ni massugu hikiyosemashita. Sudeni mahi shita hitobito ga tatte iru basho e. Nanika o shinakereba narimasen! Osoraku kagaku-sha wa kono kyooki o tomeru hoohoo o shitte irudeshou.
